```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
df_1 <- read.csv("/Users/jiayin/Desktop/monthly_usage.csv")
head(df_1)
```

```{r}
df_1[,'year']<-factor(df_1[,'year'])
df_1[,'month']<-factor(df_1[,'month'])
ggplot(df_1, aes(x=month, y = num_trips, group = year, color = year)) + geom_line() + facet_grid(rows = vars(year)) + ggtitle("Number of Trips by Year") + xlab("Month") + ylab("Trips")
```

```{r}
df_2 = read.csv("/Users/jiayin/Desktop/weekend_weekday_dist.csv")
df_2
```

```{r}
df_2[,'is_weekend']<-factor(df_2[,'is_weekend'])
df_2[,'hour']<-factor(df_2[,'hour'])
ggplot(df_2, aes(x=hour, y = total_num_trips, group = is_weekend)) + geom_bar(stat="identity", fill = "steelblue1") + facet_grid(rows = vars(is_weekend)) + ggtitle("Number of Trips by Hour") + xlab("Hour") + ylab("Trips")
```
